title: My cousin and I want to get started as streamers, I thought you guys might be interested to watch
body:
Help us out and tell us where we could improve in game (should be a lot to fix) and also the stream. Love to hear your guys opinions. we should be on most of the summer so come join us on the stream for some games and stuff :D

twitch.tv/undew

replies.body: invest in your stream mate for optimum results. give aways and more give aways rp cards etc. that wil build ur viewers fairly quick gl with the venture let me no when u get some skin giveaways etc ill come watch ^^
I would definitely do that but only once I get like 10 consistent followers/viewers. I dont want to give out free skins and waste my money for no reasn

That seems an awful lot like you're just trying to get skins for free.

But, it's the truth, a contest will drastically increase the number of viewers.

Work on getting better first, nobody wants to watch someone who makes mechanical mistakes every 5 seconds. Not trying to dig at you, and it's nothing personal, in fact, I would LOVE to see more oceanic streamers, but the fact is, there is no reason to watch this, over watching TheOddOne, Scarra, QTpie, Dyrus, or Xpecial, etc.
What if we were trying to just have fun and made a couple mistakes on the way. would you (personally) watch if you saw it was a fun stream with some mistakes?

Normally I'd be the first in here trolling you, but today I may be nice! Don't give up and don't aim to stream like a pro, what you need to do is win people over with your personalities, don't worry about winning games, just have fun and make sure your viewers have fun. Try not to be toxic until you're famous, as 9/10 people wont buy that crap unless you're pro.

Oh, don't ask for donations, just ask people to recommend a friend until you get higher up with viewers, then feel free to do that but for now you want viewers, not money. I mean PewDiePie is famous, so you can be to and his videos are worse than Miley Cyrus and Justin Bieber combined.

Yeah, I don't want donations unless I was doing a charity stream but I'm not. I'm just trying to have fun with my cousin and hope some people can join us. You never know what will happen if you don't try, something good can come out of it. 

I made myself an overlay because I do photoshop but I'm not trying to be a pro or anything.
why do %%%% %%%%s not know how to link properly?
why do some people get hearts for swearing, while i get %s?

truth is dude, nobody wants to watch you stream then tell you how you did poorly, and nobody wants to watch you stream in gold or lower.

as a troll would say "git gud"
